CustomerHook.h1: Do you have an idea for a website?
CustomerHook.h2: Build a website that meets your expectations, and my pricing calculation tool will estimate the cost and provide you with comparisons to other offers.
CustomerHook.toolH2: Choose the functionalities you want to have on your website.

templates.name: Business Card Website
templates.description: A business card website is usually a short web page that presents basic information about a company, person, or product. It typically includes a name, logo, contact details, and a brief description of the company's activities or service offerings.

templates.name: Blog Website
templates.description: A blog website is used for publishing content in the form of articles or posts. It usually covers various topics, allows comments, and provides the option for readers to subscribe to the content.

templates.name: Internet Platform
templates.description: An internet platform is a comprehensive online solution that allows users to perform various actions, such as purchasing products, using services, and communicating with other users.

templates.name: Online Store
templates.description: An online store is a website where you can make purchases online. It includes a product catalog, shopping cart, payment system, and other features that enable customers to complete transactions.

templates.name: Portfolio Website
templates.description: A portfolio website is used to present works, achievements, or projects completed by an individual, artist, freelancer, etc. It typically includes a photo gallery, project descriptions, and contact information.

templates.name: Landing Page
templates.description: A landing page, also known as a destination page, is a single web page whose purpose is to convert visitors into potential customers or subscribers by providing focused information and a call to action.

toolItems.name: User Login System
toolItems.description: A secure user login system for your website that not only collects user data to later send them tailored offers based on their preferences but also provides convenience in accessing the content provided on your website.

toolItems.name: 3D Graphics on Homepage
toolItems.description: 3D preview on your homepage will please the eye of your potential customers. With 3D graphics, we can create a beautiful user experience.

toolItems.name: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
toolItems.description: Give your users the opportunity to learn more about what you do. FAQ questions often appear in Google search, which means your website will reach a larger audience.

toolItems.name: Blog or News Section
toolItems.description: Consistently maintain your blog, which will appear in Google search to attract interested customers to your store, portfolio website, or purely hobbyist website.

toolItems.name: Client References or Testimonials
toolItems.description: Positive references can provide a high position in Google, resulting in even more traffic to your website with each newly added review.

toolItems.name: Website Navigation
toolItems.description: Clear layout and smooth navigation will provide users with the best experience of using your website.

toolItems.name: Contact Form
toolItems.description: Give users the ability to contact you through a special form that can appear as a floating object from the screen or a separate 'Contact' tab.

toolItems.name: Up-to-Date Data and Content
toolItems.description: Independently add content to your homepage whenever updates are needed.

toolItems.name: Product or Service Descriptions, Pricing
toolItems.description: We will showcase the resources you have in the most optimal way possible!

About.title: A few words about me
About.description: I am a front-end developer with 3 years of experience in website development. I have worked with many clients from all over the world. I am a passionate programmer who loves to create beautiful and functional websites. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer. Alongside my passion for coding, I have a deep interest in fitness and enjoy spending time at the gym. Additionally, I am a huge fan of video games and love to play them with my friends in my free time.

Auth.h1: Sign in to your account and manage your content.
Auth.h2: Create, edit, and delete posts on your blog, view your website statistics, and more.
Auth.passwordShortError: Password must be at least 6 characters long.

TechnologiesPage.h2: Cutting-edge technologies that I utilize for website development and programming web applications.
TechnologiesPage.h3: All of my projects are available on my github account.

Technologies.name: React.js
Technologies.description: React is a great alternative to classical JavaScript. It allows for creating components that are easy to maintain, extend, and implement.

Technologies.name: Next.js
Technologies.description: With Next.js, we can build web applications at a large scale, and despite its size, it will be optimized for every user on any device.

Technologies.name: Redux
Technologies.description: Redux is a library for managing application state. It allows us to efficiently solve problems that require complex logic in their implementation.

Technologies.name: Firebase
Technologies.description: Firebase Storage provides a simple and scalable way to store and serve user-generated content such as images, videos, and other files.

Technologies.name: OpenAI
Technologies.description: OpenAI is a technology that allows for generating images based on text. It is a great tool for professionals in almost every field.

Technologies.name: Three.js
Technologies.description: Three.js is a library that allows for creating 3D graphics in the browser. It is a great tool for creating interactive websites.

ProjectsThumbnails.title: Decocanva
ProjectsThumbnails.description: Decocanva is a platform for generating graphics using OpenAI technology. User experience is smooth and intuitive for every user. The project is useful for both developers and users who want to explore the capabilities of artificial intelligence. In the future, it may provide steady work for artists who will be able to paint an image generated by artificial intelligence

images.alt: Decocanva tutorial for the best user experience

ProjectsThumbnails.title: ManicureGrudziadz
ProjectsThumbnails.description: An internet application dedicated to manicure. It contains all information about services, a blog, a photo gallery, and a contact form. The project is currently under development. Fun fact: Application contains images generated with decocanva.com.
